summary:
Arcane Assassin allows the player to have arcane archery, spells attached to arrows
Current Project is Work in Progress, Video on Page shows demonstration
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]DONT FORGET TO [b][color=#40FF40]ENDORSE[/color][/b] AND [b][color=#40FF40]VOTE[/color][/b], SHOW YOUR SUPPORT[/size]

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] VIDEOS [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]

[size=4]Current Abilities[/size]
[youtube]_ELhUe5lGc0[/youtube]
[youtube]Ce9dL10O3_E[/youtube]
[youtube]K3blQb4G994[/youtube]
[youtube]O711EnY8qfQ[/youtube]
[youtube]Yhga9NXV08Y[/youtube]
[youtube]_tenlH5r_O0[/youtube]

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] VERSION HISTORY [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]


[b][color=#40FF40]0.20a[/color][/b]
- Arcane Assassin is found in its expanded version of Sneak Tree
- New spell called Divine Misery (Consecration)
- Fixed some spelling errors
- Shadow Step has a 5 Second cooldown, and a 1 Minute timer before it resets
- Custom sounds created for Shadow Step (When the timer is up, only plays if not used before timer expires)
- Custom sound for Divine Misery

[b][color=#40FF40]0.10d[/color][/b] 
- Shadow Strike, has animations that work with Swords and a new animation for Dagger
- Best results for Shadow Strike chances, are when you are sneaking / undetected
- Arcane Bows now have a graphically changed to fit its behavior
- Skill up with the Arcane Bows in Destruction has been reduced
- Arcane Bows magicka cost is increased, now cost 206 magicka

[b][color=#40FF40]0.10c[/color][/b] 
- Essentials can not be killed, you will just simply bump into them
- Hopefully fixed Vengence from now showing up in the Onehanded Skill tree

[b][color=#40FF40]0.10b[/color][/b] 
- Support for Midas Bound Dagger

[b][color=#40FF40]0.10a[/color][/b] 
- Ghost Form has been redeveloped
- New Perk Vengence (One-handed), Consecration (Restoration), Syndicate (Sneak)
- Upon Updating / Installing you will recieve a Manual 
- Arcane Bows have been redesigned, and added a Poison Bow

[b][color=#40FF40]0.9a[/color][/b] 
- New Perk Inspiration (Alteration)
- New Perk Darkness (Conjuration)
- Arcane Bows now skill up Archery and now benifit from Soul Steeler perk
- Arcane Shock Bow has a chance to disintergrate the target if destruction perk is present
- Auto-equip arrow feature has been removed, and is now present in the CUPID - Arrow Be Gone mod
- Scripting / Mod has been revisited to fix bugs and to improve stability

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] DESCRIPTION [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
Arcane Assassin allows the player to bend the elements for destroying your enemies

Steam Workshop Link: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8196]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8196[/url]

<must update documentation, out of date>
<more to come, taking time to learn the ropes of the Creation Kit>

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] FEATURES [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
[size=3][color=#FF00FF]Arcane Assassin Manual[/color][/size]
Arcane Assassin 0.10a, will give you a book that will allow you to learn what new spells incase you were using a previous version that did not add the new spells / abilities in the 0.10a. Book is automatically given too you. It will also give you information on what is added and where to find things. It will be a readers manual for Arcane Assassin, because i had some people come and did not read the description so hopefully this helps them in-game :)

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] INSTALL [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
Remeber to always back up your saves before installing any .ESP plugin
Place the ESP / BSA into your [b]Skyrim/Data[/b] folder

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] FUTURE DEVELOPMENTS [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
<more to come>

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] CONFLICTS [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
[size=2][color=red]NOTE[/color][/size] - [b]Remember to always back up your saves before installing any .ESP plugin[/b]

This mod will possibly conflict with any other plugin that alters Perks in anyway

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] OTHER MODS OF MINE [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
